participant_1.background:
I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
i love new technology.
I read a book with my cats every morning before breakfast.
I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking.
i started working at google last week on self driving car research.

participant_2.background:
I'm afraid of disappointing my family.
I use my iPhone 7 to secretly call my boyfriend when I'm out with my parents.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
my horse never talks back to me.
I went to Japan during college and stayed with a host family

content.text: Hey! I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks! I just started working at Google last week on self-driving car research. It's really exciting!

Wow, that's amazing! I'm so glad to hear that you're excited about it. I'm actually a bit afraid of disappointing my family. I'm passionate about making music and expressing myself through it, but they're not really supportive of it.

I'm sorry to hear that. I know how it feels to have family members who don't support your dreams. My parents were never really supportive of my filmmaking career, but I just kept going with it anyway. And now I'm finally starting to make a name for myself.

That's really inspiring! I'm glad to hear that you didn't let your parents stop you from following your dreams. I'm going to keep working on my music, and hopefully one day I'll be able to make them proud.
I know you can do it! Just keep working hard and never give up on your dreams.
Thanks for the encouragement! I really appreciate it.
No problem! Have a great day!
